revision.text: ==Tsimshian== ===Etymology=== From {{m|tsi|yaamx||bait, lure; trick|pos=verb, noun}}. ===Verb=== {{head|tsi|verb}} # to imitate a deer or seal so as to lure (something) ===Noun=== {{head|tsi|noun}} # [[fraud]] ===References=== * John Asher Dunn, ''Sm'algyax: A Reference Dictionary and Grammar'' (1995, {{ISBN|0295974192}}
